short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze WhatsApp group messages and display a recommended response.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your WhatsApp Web group chat experience with WhatsApp Chat Group Chat Assistant, an innovative Chrome extension that reads messages in real time and generates intelligent, context-aware response suggestions.

Instructions:
- Open any group chat on WhatsApp web (https://web.whatsapp.com)
- Click on the extension icon and get an auto generated response.

Key Features:
AI-Powered Response Generation: Receive smart and contextually relevant response suggestions based on ongoing group chat discussions.
Seamless Integration: Works directly with WhatsApp Web without requiring additional software or configurations.
Time-Saving Communication: Quickly respond with AI-generated suggestions or tweak them for a personal touch.
Privacy First: All processing is performed locally in your browser, ensuring your messages remain private and secure.
Customizable Settings: Adjust response tone and style to fit your communication needs.
Whether you're a multitasker or just looking to add efficiency to your chats, WhatsApp Chat Companion is your go-to tool for effortless and meaningful communication.

Note: This extension requires WhatsApp Web to be open in your browser for it to function. Responses are suggestions only; users are advised to verify content before sending.

Get Started Today! Install now and let WhatsApp Chat Companion make your group chat experience smarter and more efficient.
